Text.Name: Tang_Dan
Text.Desc: Specialized in Alchemy. Improve disciples' Alchemy-related abilities according to those of the Branch Leader.

Text.Name: Tang_Qi
Text.Desc: Specialized in Artifact Crafting. Improve disciples' Artifact Crafting-related abilities according to those of the Branch Leader.

Text.Name: Tang_Zhan
Text.Desc: Specialized in Battle. Improve disciples' Battle-related abilities according to those of the Branch Leader.

Text.Name: Tang_XiuLian
Text.Desc: Specialized in Cultivation/Training. Improve disciples' Cultivation/Training-related abilities according to those of the Branch Leader.

Text.Name: Tang_WaiShi
Text.Desc: Specialized in Foreign Affairs. Improve disciples' work and skill abilities according to those of the Branch Leader.
